title: Auto-transition issues to Ready when dependencies complete
description: Issues remain in Backlog state even when all dependencies are in terminal states (Done/Rejected). Expected: When an issue's last dependency completes, it should automatically transition from Backlog to Ready. Actual: Issues stay in Backlog and require manual 'jit issue update --state ready'. Example: Issue c4738097 had two dependencies (277afb61 and db7fdd9a), both Done, but remained in Backlog. This affects workflow automation and agent coordination - agents can't discover newly-ready work without manual intervention.
